text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Greetings! You stand within the venue 
of the Trainer Proficiency Test!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
The aim here is to bolster the training 
capabilities you hold for your trainee! 
I strongly urge you all to take on this 
challenge!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
For now! The only thing to do is practice. 
You are free to eliminate your weak 
points, or focus on maximizing your 
strengths.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Of course, I have arranged for rewards 
to be prepared, so using them as 
motivation is also acceptable!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Rouse yourselves! The harder you strive, 
the prouder your assigned trainee will 
become!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Encouragement! I sincerely wish for the 
advancement of your skills! 
Ha-ha-ha-ha!
